Feb. 17, 2018 D Unibrass Shield
Unibrass Shield 1 Entertainments Contest UniBrass: The University Brass Band Championships of Great Britain and Northern Ireland unibrass-shield
York Barbican, York, North Yorkshire, England, UK Best soloist: Jacob Smith (euphonium, Leeds University Union Music Society - Rhapsody for Euphonium, James Curnow) Most enertaining: Cambridge University Best march: Nottingham Trent University (Aces High) Best percussion: Nottingham Trent University Best student conductor: University of York Best student composition: 'I Love My Love' (Owen Russell, University of York)
Nov. 20, 2017, 5:15 p.m. Feb. 21, 2018, 3:28 p.m.
